element.name: TListViewFilterEdit.ByAllFields
element.short: Use all ListView fields when searching filter matches. Otherwise just the first field (ListView caption) is used.

element.name: TListViewFilterEdit.Items
element.short: Maintains the data which is filtered and shown in the ListView.

element.name: TListViewFilterEdit.SelectionList
element.short: List of selected items. They are restored after filtering.
